Taunton.Abiezar Dean House:
The Abiezar Dean House is a historic house located at 57 Summer Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The late Federal Period house was built in 1835, and is a two-story, wood-framed house, five bays wide, with a hipped roof, clapboard siding, and interior end chimneys. Its central entrance is trimmed by a semi-elliptical fanlight and narrow sidelights.
